scripts.test: lerna changed 2>/dev/null | xargs -n 1  lerna run test --scope
scripts.lint: lerna changed 2>/dev/null | xargs -n 1  lerna run lint --scope
scripts.update-package-lock-json: lerna exec "npm install -s --ignore-scripts --package-lock-only --no-audit" && git add core/*/package-lock.json && git add core/*/package.json && git commit -m "bump version [skip ci]"
scripts.bump-version: lerna version patch --no-push --yes --no-git-tag-version -m "$(git log -1 --pretty=%B) .... bump version [skip ci]" && npm run update-package-lock-json
